properties.label: Operation
properties.description: Operation to be done

properties.label: host
properties.description: Hostname/computer name or IP address of remote server host

properties.label: port
properties.description: Port number for host server. e.g. 21

properties.label: username
properties.description: Username for remote host server

properties.label: password
properties.description: Password for username e.g. secrets.TOKEN, Secrets can be used to reference encrypted authentication credentials in Connectors. See the Secrets documentation for more details.

properties.label: folderPath
properties.description: Folder path in remote server

properties.label: File Name Pattern
properties.description: Regular expression Simple *.txt kind works

properties.label: ModifiedBefore
properties.description: used to provide list of files modified before[dd/MM/yyyy]

properties.label: ModifiedAfter
properties.description: used to provide list of files modified after [dd/MM/yyyy]

properties.label: SearchSubFolders
properties.description: If the value is True, Search subfolders in given folder path

properties.label: maxNumberOfFiles
properties.description: The maximum number of files to get as a output.

properties.label: maxDepth
properties.description: Max level for search inside folderpath

properties.label: sortBy
properties.description: sortBy - Sort By for sorting files/folders based on specified parameter.

properties.label: outputType
properties.description: Output Type of the files. If set as filePaths, output will contain only paths of files. If set as FileDetails then output will contain fileDetails

properties.label: sourceFolderPath
properties.description: Address of file which you want to copy

properties.label: File Name
properties.description: Address of folder from were you want to paste a file

properties.label: Target Folder Path
properties.description: Address of folder were you want to paste a file

properties.label: Action If File Exists
properties.description: If the file is already present in Target folder, rename, replace or skip operation have to be performed

properties.label: createTargetFolder
properties.description: Boolean to create target folder, if folder doesn't exists. Default false

properties.label: sourceFolderPath
properties.description: Address of folder

properties.label: File Name
properties.description: Address of folder from where you want to move a file

properties.label: Target Folder Path
properties.description: Address of folder were you want to paste a file

properties.label: Action If File Exists
properties.description: If the file is already present in Target folder, rename, replace or skip operation have to be performed

properties.label: createTargetFolder
properties.description: Boolean to create target folder, if folder doesn't exists. Default false

properties.label: sourceFolderPath
properties.description: Full Address of folder from which you want to copy

properties.label: targetFolderPath
properties.description: Address of targetFolder in which you want to paste a file

properties.label: Action If Folder Exists
properties.description: If the file is already present in Target folder, rename, replace or skip operation have to be performed

properties.label: createTargetFolder
properties.description: Boolean to create target folder, if folder doesn't exists. Default false

properties.label: sourceFolderPath
properties.description: Full Address of folder from which you want to move

properties.label: targetFolderPath
properties.description: Address of targetFolder in which you want to paste a file

properties.label: Action If Folder Exists
properties.description: If the file is already present in Target folder, rename, replace or skip operation have to be performed

properties.label: createTargetFolder
properties.description: Boolean to create target folder, if folder doesn't exists. Default false

properties.label: parentFolderPath
properties.description: Full Address of folder inside which you want to create a folder

properties.label: folderName
properties.description: New Folder name

properties.label: Action If File Exists
properties.description: If the file is already present in Target folder, rename, replace or skip operation have to be performed

properties.label: Folder Path
properties.description: Folder Path of desired deleting file

properties.label: File Name
properties.description: Name of the file to be deleted

properties.label: Parent Folder Path
properties.description: Name of the file to be deleted

properties.label: Folder Name
properties.description: Name of the file to be deleted

properties.label: folderPath
properties.description: Folder Path

properties.label: File Name
properties.description: Address of file which you want to read

properties.label: folderPath
properties.description: Folder Path

properties.label: File Name
properties.description: Address of file which you want to read

properties.label: File Content
properties.description: Content to be written to file

properties.label: Append Content??
properties.description: If the value is True, the content will be appended to existing content of the file.

properties.label: folderPath
properties.description: Folder path in remote server

properties.label: Folder Name Pattern
properties.description: Regular expression Simple *.txt kind works

properties.label: ModifiedBefore
properties.description: used to provide list of files modified after[dd/MM/yyyy]

properties.label: ModifiedAfter
properties.description: used to provide list of files modified before[dd/MM/yyyy]

properties.label: SearchSubFolders
properties.description: If the value is True, Search subfolders in given folder path

properties.label: maxNumberOfFiles
properties.description: The maximum number of files to get as a output.

properties.label: maxDepth
properties.description: Max level for search inside folderpath

properties.label: sortBy
properties.description: sortBy - Sort By for sorting files/folders based on specified parameter.

properties.label: outputType
properties.description: Output Type of the folders. If set as folderPaths, output will contain only paths of folders. If set as FolderDetails then output will contain folderDetails

properties.label: Result Variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result Expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error Expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.
